inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: The patient developed respiratory failure requiring mechanical ventilation.

inclusion.criterion: Arterial blood gas analysis showing a PaCO2 >45 mmHg and pH <7.35
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: His arterial blood gas analysis showed a PaCO2 of 50 mmHg and pH of 7.25.

inclusion.criterion: Use of accessory muscles of respiration or paradoxical respiration
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: He used accessory muscles of respiration.

exclusion.criterion: Severe impairment of consciousness (Glasgow coma scale score <8)
exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: The patient was conscious and alert.

exclusion.criterion: Inability to clear respiratory secretions (Airway care score [ACS] ≥12)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Abnormalities that preclude proper fit of the NIV interface
exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: The patient's facial anatomy was normal.

exclusion.criterion: Subjects who have an artificial airway like tracheostomy tube or T-tube
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Contraindications for insertion of naso-/orogastric feeding tube
exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: The patient did not have any contraindications.

exclusion.criterion: Unwillingness to undergo placement of nasogastric catheter
exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: The patient was willing to undergo the procedure.

notes: The patient has been previously vaccinated with meningococcal group ACWY conjugate vaccine and meningococcal group B vaccine.
